doc:
Margaret Sheridan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Sheridan 0 Margaret Elizabeth Sheridan (October 29, 1926 – May 1, 1982) was an American actress of the early 1950s, and protégée of director Howard Hawks. She is best remembered for her role as Nikki Nickolson opposite Kenneth Tobey in the 1951 science fiction classic The Thing from Another World. Margaret_Elizabeth_Sheridan ( October_29_,_1926 – May_1_,_1982 ) was an_American_actress of the_early_1950s , and protégée of director_Howard_Hawks . She is_best_remembered for her_role as Nikki_Nickolson_opposite_Kenneth_Tobey in the_1951_science_fiction classic_The_Thing from Another_World .
